name: Hyper Simox 3000
description:
Hyper Simox 3000 is an Arcade Shoot' Em Up Puzzle game that combines the SHMUP mechanics with the oldschool 'Simon' memory games. You should hit the enemies with the special shot on the order showed, while shooting the others with the regular shot.

Made for Ludum Dare 41 - Theme: 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres'

Controls:

  • ARROWS - Move the spaceship
  • X - Regular Shot
  • Z - Special Shot
